short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Input a phone number, and the extension will craft a direct link to open a WhatsApp chat window with that contact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your WhatsApp experience with the "WhatsApp Quick Link Opener" Chrome extension! No more hassle of copying and pasting numbers – effortlessly initiate WhatsApp chats by inputting the number directly. This intuitive extension streamlines your communication process, allowing you to connect with friends, family, and colleagues with just a click.

Key Features:

User-Friendly Interface: Input the desired phone number and click the button – it's as simple as that!
Instant WhatsApp Access: The extension instantly opens a new tab with a WhatsApp link, taking you directly to the chat window of the provided number.
Efficiency at Your Fingertips: Save time and skip the manual search – initiate conversations in seconds.
How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to the extension icon in your toolbar and click to open the input popup.
Input the phone number you want to connect with on WhatsApp.
Click the "Open WhatsApp" button, and a new tab will launch with the WhatsApp chat for the provided number.
Make connecting on WhatsApp a breeze – download "WhatsApp Quick Link Opener" and streamline your messaging experience!

Note: This extension is an independent tool and is not affiliated with WhatsApp or Google. It's designed to enhance user convenience when initiating WhatsApp chats
